scripts.build: npx tsc && pnpm run manifest && pnpm run data
scripts.manifest: cp fxmanifest.lua dist || copy fxmanifest.lua dist
scripts.data: cp $(find *.json -maxdepth 1 -not -type d ! -name "tsconfig.json" ! -name "package.json") dist || robocopy . dist *.json /xf tsconfig.json /xf package.json
